thread.section_title: Spier Wine Farm (Stellenbosch, South Africa): Top Tips Before You Go - TripAdvisor
thread.title: My Spier overnight stay.
thread.title_full: My Spier overnight stay. - Review of Spier Wine Farm, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: Robert M
title: My Spier overnight stay.
text:
We had an excellent experience at the Spier wine estate. Excellent everything, very professional, real pleasent staff, very professional.
As a tour director with more than 30 years of experience all over the world. I've stayed at every level of accommodation on this planet. Spier in my book is right up there amongst the best. Believe me I don't say that about every place I stay. Over the years I have watched Spier grow and improve.
